summary:
Jan Gerrit Tesink is an all-round solid waste management adviser with a broad background in environmental engineering supplemented with more than thirty years experience gained in various cultural, political and environmental settings including West and Eastern Europe, the Balkan, the Middle and Far East, South America, the Caribbean and North and Sub-Saharan Africa.

Extensive short-term and more than fifteen years residential, international experience in assisting national governments, local governments and private enterprises within the fields of:

* (municipal) solid waste management
* healthcare waste management.
* environmental and waste policy development, 
* environmental impact assessment 

Excellent project management and team leader skills; ability to select, contract and manage experts in multi-disciplinary and multi-cultural teams; experience in procurement of goods, works and services as well as contract management and supervision of works as FIDIC engineer.

Vast experience in both project preparation and project implementation including technical, organisational, institutional, legal and financial aspects; proven ability to execute and manage environmental projects in each and every stage of the project cycle, from identification, via preparation and appraisal to implementation and evaluation. Experience in co-operation with and understanding of working procedures of various IFI’s and donor organisations including EIB, NEFCO, NIB, the Dutch Government (DGIS), DANCEE and DANIDA and the EU. Familiar with EU environmental legislation and in depth knowledge of the Waste Management Directives.

Proven ability to apply various working methods including the (community) participatory approach and the Logical Framework Approach (LFA). Vast experience in providing both formal training and training on the job.

school.name: Prof. H.C. van Hall Institute, University of Professional Education in . Environmental . Sciences ..

profile_positions.description:
Recent Assignments: 

• Macedonia: TL for the project SWM in the Polog Region
• Egypt: Development of technical specifications for a central treatment facility for healthcare waste under contract with UNDP
• Jordan: TL for the Greater Amman Municipality SWM Corporate development project
• Home based: Elaboration of terms of reference for a 4 year support programme for enhancement of solid waste management in Bosnia and Herzegovina to be funded by the Swedish Embassy in Sarajevo.
• Macedonia: TA to IPA Unit in Ministry of Environment to enhance capacity to manage EU funded waste projects
• Tajikistan: Assignment for UNDP: Development of a Waste Management Strategy in Tajikistan.
• Brussels: Expert/Proposal Evaluator for 2014 and 2015 EU calls for proposals.
• Latvia: Mission to Valmiera for advising the North Vidzeme Waste Management Organisation, 15 
  years after having been involved in the foundation of this organisation.
• Kosovo; Assignment for UN-HABITAT within the framework of the Municipal Spatial Planning 
  Support Programme; development of local solid waste management plans and training of central 
  and municipal government staff.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Engineer / Waste Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Team leader for the project "Technical Assistance for the Treatment of Healthcare Waste" in Serbia.The work and responsibilities included, but were not limited to:
•	Elaboration of a National Plan for Healthcare Waste Management
•	Drafting of a By-law on healthcare and veterinary waste management
•	Development of training material and conduction both formal training and training on the job
•	Development of a series of guidelines on injection safety, laboratory safety, infectious waste treatment, infectious waste transportation, healthcare waste management in healthcare institutions, veterinary waste management and pharmaceutical waste management
•	Development of a curriculum and textbook on healthcare waste management for secondary medical schools educating student nurses and healthcare technicians.
•	Supervision of supply and installation of autoclaves for infectious waste treatment
•	Supervision of collection, export and destruction of pharmaceutical waste
•	Institutional strengthening and capacity building
profile_positions.title: Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
Example of assignments:
Turkey: Medical Waste Management Planning
Turkey: Project Management Assistance
Lesotho: Medical Waste Management 
Turkey: Design for Dumpsite Closure
profile_positions.title: Waste Management Consultant

profile_positions.description: Project manager for the Lusaka Waste Management Project – Phases A and B. Elaboration and implementation of the solid waste master plan for Lusaka, set-up and strengthening of a Waste Management Unit within the Council, elaboration of by-laws, strengthening of the private waste sector, design and implementation of awareness campaigns, implementation of city wide waste collection system, set-up and implementation of cross-subsidisation system for service provision to the poor, EIA and detailed design for sanitary landfill, procurement of waste collection and landfill equipment, supervision of landfill construction (as FIDIC Engineer).
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Various waste management projects in Latvia, Estonia, Bulgaria, Uganda, Vietnam, Cambodia, Slovakia ...
profile_positions.title: Project Manager; Team Leader; Environmental expert

profile_positions.description: Waste Expert in the environmental peer review (EPR) mission to Uzbekistan and first reviewer of the waste chapter of the EPR reports for Romania, Estonia and Uzbekistan
